alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clarke and Lauderdale Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 743 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Meridian, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marion around 750 PM CDT. Causeyville around 755 PM CDT. Toomsuba around 800 PM CDT. Alamucha and Kewanee around 805 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for east central Mississippi.
